Payback: Increases troop damage to Barbarians by 7.5%.
Onslaught: Increases troop normal attack dealt by 1.5%.
Retaliation: Increases troop counterattack damage dealt by 2.5%.
Enraged: Increases troop skill damage dealt by 2.5%.
Iron Wall: Troop normal attack damage taken is reduced by 1.5%.
Bellicose: Troops normal attacks have a 10% chance to increase all troop damage by 5% for 3 seconds. Cooldown: 5 seconds.
Pulverize: Troops normal attacks have a 10% chance to deal 20% increased normal attack damage for 1 second. Cooldown: 5 seconds.
Breaker: Troops normal attacks have a 10% chance to reduce the targets defence by 15% for 3 seconds. Cooldown: 5 seconds.
Furious: After using an active skill troops deal 8% more skill damage for 3 seconds. Cooldown: 5 seconds.
Ward: After using an active skill troops take 5% less damage from all sources for 3 seconds. Cooldown: 5 seconds.
Phalanx: After using an active skill troops have a 30% chance to gain a damage-absorbing shield (damage factor 100) for 3 seconds. Cooldown: 5 seconds.
Hurried: Troops gain 15% increased march speed for 10 seconds after leaving battle.
Tremors: Troops skill damage also has a 30% chance to deal direct damage to the target (damage factor 100). This skill can trigger once every 5 seconds.
Calm: Troops skill damage also has a 30% chance to grant 10% increased attack for 3 seconds. Cooldown: 5 seconds
Loosed: Troops in ranged mode have a 10% chance of dealing additional ranged skill damage to the current target (damage factor 200). This damage can only slightly wound units. Cooldown: 5 seconds.
Annexer: Increases troop damage to Barbarians by 7.5%.
Warhunger: Increases troop normal attack dealt by 1.5%.
Alert: Increases troop counterattack damage dealt by 2.5%.
Devious: Increases troop skill damage dealt by 2.5%.
Evasive: Reduces troop counterattack damage taken by 2.5%. (Instrument/Common) or Reduces all troop damage taken by 1% (Emblem/Common)
Requital: Troops’s under attack have a 10% chance of retaliating with additional damage (damage factor 50) for 2 seconds. Cooldown: 5 seconds.
Respite: When attacked, troops have a 10% chance to decrease all damage taken by 10% for 2 seconds. Cooldown: 5 seconds.
Guarded: Troops taking skill damage have a 10% chance to decrease damage taken by 20%. Cooldown: 5 seconds.
Embattled: Troops taking skill damage have a 10% chance to restore 50 rage. Cooldown: 5 seconds.
Vengeful: Troops attacks grant an additional 10 rage (up to 2 rage) per 10% units lost.
Patronage: Troops receiving healing or a shield deal 2% more damage of all types for 3 seconds. Cooldown: 5 seconds.
Primed: Troops march speed by 5% over 50% unit strength.
Uplifting: Normal attacks deal 1% more damage (up to by 5%) every 10 seconds after entering battle.
Spirited: Troops deal 5% increased damage of all types over 70% rage.
Bluster: Troops have a 10% chance of resisting incoming control effects while dealing direct damage to 3 nearby enemy troops (damage factor 100). Damage dealt to each target is reduced by 15% for each additional target and has a 5 second cooldown.
Cleanser: Increases troop damage to Barbarians by 7.5%.
Striker: Increases troop normal attack dealt by 1.5%.
Rebuff: Increases troop counterattack damage dealt by 2.5%.
Brawler: Increases troop skill damage dealt by 2.5%.
Eclipsed: Reduces troop skill damage taken by 2.5%.
Brave: Increases troops counterattack damage dealt by 5% when surrounded.
Strategic: Increases damage dealt to surrounded troops by 2%.
Desperado: Troops take 2% reduced damage from of all types when less than 50% units remain.
Cohesive: Troops deal 2% increased damage of all types when over 50% units remain.
Pursuer: All troops damage dealt increased by 2% against troops with fewer than 20% units remaining.
Assertive: Increases troop damage dealt by 2% while on the map.
Wary: Troops march 5% faster outside alliance territory.
Siegework: All troops deal 2% increased damage when attacking a city or stronghold.
Sentries: Troops take 2% reduced damage while garrisoning.
Ballistics: Increases damage dealt by 3% in ranged mode.
Pacifier: Increases troop damage to Barbarians by 7.5%.
Militant: Increases troop normal attack dealt by 1.5%.
Resistant: Increases troop counterattack damage dealt by 2.5%.
Daring: Increases troop skill damage dealt by 2.5%.
Smite: Increases troops normal attack damage by 2%.
Artisan: Increases troop skill damage dealt by 3%.
Deflecter: Reduces troop skill damage taken by 3%.
Watchmen: Reduces all troop damage taken by 1.5%.
Lineshot: Increases troop ranged normal attack damage by 5%.
Crazed: Whenever the troops deals direct damage, it gains 35 rage. Cooldown: 2 seconds
Boiling Blood: The troop gains a 2% boost to skill damage dealt. Whenever the troop deals direct damage to it's current target, their troop has a 30% chance to reduce all incoming skill damage by 5% for the next 3 seconds. Cooldown: 5 seconds
Defiant: Increases the normal damage resistance of the troop by 3%
Focus Fire: The troop gains a 4% boost to skill damage dealt
Battle Ready: Whenever the troop launches a basic attack, it has a 10% chance to consume 100 rage to gain a 35% bonus to normal damage dealt for 2 seconds. Cooldown: 5 seconds
Even-Keeled: The troop gains a 1.5% boost to normal damage dealt. Whenever their troop launches a basic attack, it has a 10% chance to reduce all incoming damage by 5% but also deal 10% less skill damage for the next 3 seconds. Cooldown: 5 seconds
Unswerving: Increases the skill damage resistance of the troop by 4%
Forceful: The troop gains a 3% boost to normal damage dealt
Pummeler: Whenever the troop launches a combo attack, it has a 80% chance to gain a 10% bonus to combo attack damage dealt for 2 seconds. Cooldown: 5 seconds
Causative: The troop gains a 1.5% boost to combo attack damage dealt. Combo attack launched by their troop are 8% more likely to trigger effects triggered by launching a basic attack.
Relentless: The troop gains a 3.5% boost to combo attack damage dealt.
Back in Action: Whenever the troop is healed, the strength of said healing is increased by 8%. Cooldown: 5 seconds
Medic: The troop gains a 2% boost to all healing it receives. Whenever their troop takes damage, it has 30% chance to increase all healing it receives within the next 3 seconds by 4%. Cooldown: 5 seconds
Rise Up: Increases the skill damage resistance of the troop by 4%
Refreshing: The troop gains a 4% boost to all healing it receives
Ironclad: Whenever the troop receives a shield or is healed, the strength of any shield or healing it receives within the next 3 seconds is increased by 5%. Cooldown: 5 seconds
Strike & Parry: The troop gains a 2% boost to counterattack damage dealt. Whenever their troop receives a shield, it also receives a damage absorbing Mighty Shield for 3 seconds (DF 150). Whenever their troop is healed, it is Mighty Healed for a portion of it's slightly wounded units (HF 150). Both effects has a cooldown: 5 seconds
Unshakable: Increases the skill damage resistance of the troop by 4%
Convalescing: The troop gains a 3% boost to all healing it receives and a 3% boost to all shield it creates
Self Defense: Whenever their troop launches a basic attack, it has a 10% chance to increase the strength of any shields it creates within the next 4 seconds by 10%. Cooldown: 5 seconds
Aegis: The troop gains a 2% boost to all shields it creates. Their troop takes 5% less skill damage while it has a shield.
Reinforced: The troop gains a 4% boost to all shields it creates.
Tenacious: Increases the damage resistance of the troop by 2%
Drums of War: The troop gains a 5% boost to rage recovery speed. Whenever their troop launches a basic attack, it has a 10% chance to increase the attack of up to 3 nearby allied targets (not including itself) by 15% for 3 seconds. Cooldown: 5 seconds
Nullify: Increases the skill damage resistance of the troop by 2%. Whenever their troop takes damage, it has a 10% chance to reduce all incoming damage by 3% for the next 3 seconds.
Counter - Parry: Increases the counterattack damage resistance of the troop by 4%
Persevering: Increases the normal damage resistance of the troop by 3%
Full Draw: Whenever their troop launches a ranged basic attack, it has a 10% chance to consume 50 rage to gain a 25% bonus to ranged damage dealt for 2 seconds. Cooldown: 5 seconds
Bloody Bolt: The troop gains a 2% boost to ranged normal damage dealt. While in ranged mode, their troop deals 5% more ranged normal damage to enemy troops with less than 50% units remaining.
Tempered: Increases the skill damage resistance of troop by 4%
Sharp Arrows: The troop gains a 4% boost to ranged normal damage dealt.
Fall Back: The troop gains 20% March Speed while routed
Spread Out: Whenever their troop takes skill damage from an AOE skill, the damage is reduced by 15%. Cooldown: 60 seconds (doesn't reset after exiting combat)
Mutual Defense: If the troop is in a rally or garrison but is not the captain, the troop gains 2% severe wounded resistance
Viligant: The troop gains a 6% boost to counterattack damage dealt while garrisoned in your city
Resolute: The troop gains 5% skill damage resistance, smite damage resistance and combo attack damage resistance while garrisoned in your city.
Precautions: While garrisoned in your city and surrounded, the troop takes less damage ( damage reduction = 2% x number of surrounding troops, up to 4 troops)
Ironsides: The troop gains 3% damage resistance while garrisoned in your city
Entangling: The troop active skills reduces the March Speed of their current target by 10% for 5 seconds
Arms Race: Increases the troops Unit Capacity by 2%
Sprinter: The troops gains a 20% boost to March Speed for 10 seconds when departing buildings
Strider: Increases the March Speed of the troop by 5%
Gold Planner: Increases the Gold gathering speed of the troop by 15%
Safeguard: Reduces the number of severely wounded units in battle by 4%
Plentitude: The troop receives an extra 3% resources after gathering
Sturdy Back: Increases the resources load of the troop by 12%
Imploder: Whenever the wielder’s troop deals smite damage, the target troop loses 20% Defense for the next 2 seconds. This effect can trigger multiple times in a single second (up to 3 times) before entering its cooldown. Cooldown: 5 seconds.
Raider: The troop gains 2% smite damage boost. Whenever the troop deal smite damage, it has 50% chance to gain Rage 20% faster for the next 3 seconds. Cooldown: 10 seconds
Hardheaded: The troop gains 4% combo damage resistance
Rattling: The troop gain 4% smite damage boost
Hunter: Troops receive a 5% boost to skill damage. When dealing direct damage, damage is boosted by 10% if only one target is hit, otherwise it is boosted by 2%. Cooldown: 5 seconds.
Unstoppable: Troops receive a 5% boost to skill damage. When dealing direct damage to a target, the damage has a 30% chance to be boosted by 10%. Cooldown: 5 seconds.
Balanced: Increased troops normal attack damage resistance by 3.5% Troops deal 8% more skill damage for 3 seconds upon reaching 80% rage. Cooldown: 5 seconds.
Intrepid: Troops receive a 10% boost to skill damage
Destructive: Troops receive a 3.5% boost to normal attack damage. Normal attacks have a 10% chance to consume 100 rage, increasing the damage of that attack by 70%. Cooldown: 5 seconds.
Straight to the Point: Troops receive a 3.5% boost to normal attack damage. normal attacks have a 10% chance to increase the damage of your normal attacks by 20% and decreases the damage of your skills by 10% for 3 seconds. Cooldown: 5 seconds.
Invincible: Increased troop skill damage resistance by 5%. Increased normal attack damage dealt by 3% (up to 12%) to target troops per 20% of target units lost.
Fearless: Troops receive a 8% boost to normal attack damage
Thrasher: The troop gains a 3.5% boost to combo attack damage dealt. Whenever their troop launches a combo attack, it gains a 1.5% bonus to combo attack damage dealt for 10 seconds. This effect can stack up to 5 times.
Butterfly Effect: The troop gains a 3.5% boost to combo attack damage dealt. Combo attack launched by their troop are 20% more likely to trigger effects triggered by launching a basic attack.
Steelskin: The troop gains 2% damage resistance. Whenever their troop launches a basic attack, it takes 1.5% less damage for the next 10 seconds. This effect can stack up to 5 times.
Flurry: The troop gains a 8% boost to combo attack damage
Avenger: The troop gains a 5% boost to counterattack damage dealt. Whenever their troop uses an active skill, any healing it receives within the next 3 seconds is increased by 10%. Cooldown: 5 seconds
Guarding Light: The troop gains a 5% boost to all healing it receives. Whenever their troop takes damage, it has 30% chance to increase all healing it receives within the next 3 seconds by 10%. Cooldown: 5 seconds
Turn the Corner: Increases the skill damage resistance of the troop by 5%
Panacea: The troops gain a 10% boost to all healing it receives. Whenever their troop is healed, it gains a 5% bonus to damage dealt for 5 seconds. Cooldown: 8 seconds
Irreproachable: The troop gains a 3.5% boost to all shields it creates and all healing it receives. Whenever the troop launches a basic attack, it has a 10% chance to increase strengths of all shields and healing it receives within the next 3 seconds by 7%. Cooldown: 5 seconds
Cautious: The troop gains a 5% boost to counterattack damage dealt. Whenever their troop receives a shield or is healed, the strength of said shield/healing is increased by 7%. Cooldown: 5 seconds
Shield Bash: Increases the skill damage resistance of troop by 5%. Whenever their troop is healed or receives a shield, it gains a 3.5% bonus to damage dealt for 5 seconds. Cooldown: 8 seconds
Rock Solid: The troop gains a 7% boost to all healing it receives and a 7% boost to all shield it creates
Cocoon: Increases troop skill damage resistance by 5%. Normal attacks have a 10% chance to increase shield strength by 10% for 5 seconds. Cooldown: 5 seconds.
Inviolable: Troops receive a 5% boost to shields. Damage taken while you have a shield up is reduced by 10%.
Crowned: Troops receive a 5% boost to shields. Increases all troop damage dealt by 3% when using a shield, or 2% when not using a shield.
Influential Leader: Troops gain rage 5% faster. Normal attack damage. Normal attacks have a 10% to increase the attack of 3 nearby friendly targets (not including your own) by 15% for 3 seconds. Cooldown: 5 seconds.
Loaded: Increases troop skill damage resistance by 5%. Troops have a 10% chance to reduce incoming damage by 15% while gaining a 20% increase to march speed for 3 seconds. Cooldown: 5 seconds.
Civilized: Troops gain 5% resistance to counterattack damage. When a friendly target other than yourself receives a buff, the target receiving the buff immediately gains 25 rage. Each target can only receive this effect once per turn.
Fixed: Increases troops normal attack damage resistance by 8%.
Sharpshooter: Troops receive a 5% boost to ranged normal attack damage. Ranged normal attacks have a 10% chance to consume 50 rage to increase the damage of the attack by 50%. Cooldown: 5 seconds.
Drilled: Troops receive a 5% boost to ranged normal attack damage. When attacking from range, for every 20% decrease in the current targets units the damage dealt by your ranged normal attacks is increased by 3% (up to a maximum of 12%).
Merciless: Increases skill damage resistance by 5%. Increases size unit attack by 30% for 10 seconds after entering battle.
Astute: Troops Receive a 10% boost to ranged normal attack damage.
Hasty Retreat: The troop gains 50% March Speed while routed
Blast Shield: Whenever their troop takes skill damage from an AOE skill, the damage is reduced by 30%. Cooldown: 60 seconds (doesn't reset after exiting combat)
United Front: If the troop is in a rally or garrison but is not the captain, the troop gains 5% severe wounded resistance
Fortified: The troop gains 12.5% skill damage resistance, smite damage resistance and combo attack damage resistance while garrisoned in your city.
Chokepoint: While garrisoned in your city and surrounded, the troops takes less damage ( damage reduction = 4% x number of surrounding troops, up to 5 troops)
Steelheart: The troop gains 7% damage resistance while garrisoned in your city
Enmeshed: Active Skills reduce the march speed of the current target by 20% for 5 seconds.
Unassailed: Troops march speed increased by 50% upon departing structures for 10 seconds.
Rich: Increases troop gold gathering speed by 25%.
Battlements: Reduces the number of severely wounded units in battle by 10%.
Moneyed: Troops gain 7.5% extra resources upon gathering.
Toppler: The wielder's troop gains a 5% boost to smite damage. Whenever their troop deals smite damage, the target troop takes 20% increased smite damage for the next 3 seconds. This effect can trigger multiple times in a single second (up to 5 times) before entering its cooldown. Cooldown: 5 seconds.
Demolisher: The wielder's troop gains a 5% boost to smite damage. Whenever their troop deals smite damage, it has a 75% chance to ignore 50% of the target's Defense. This effect can trigger multiple times ina single ) second (up to 5 times) before entering its cooldown. if it only triggers once, the wielder's troop gains 100 extra Rage. Cooldown: 10 seconds.
Airtight: The troop gains 5% combo damage resistance. Whenever it deals smite damage, troop takes 10% less damage for the next 3 seconds. Cooldown: 5 seconds
